error.message: Parameter $entityQuery of method Drupal\context_groups\Form\GroupAddForm::__construct() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\Core\Entity\Query\QueryFactory. Deprecated in drupal:8.3.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getQuery() or \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getAggregateQuery() instead.
Call to deprecated constant REGIONS_ALL: Deprecated in drupal:8.3.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\block\BlockRepositoryInterface::REGIONS_ALL instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to context_groups.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
